mapper.select: select "DWMC","SJL_WT" from "GP_SZZF_R"."JRPM_JRZL" order by SJL_WT desc;
select "DWMC","SJL_WT" from "GP_SZZF_R"."JRPM_RZL" order by SJL_WT desc;
select "DWMC","SJL_WT" from "GP_SZZF_R"."JRPM_QB" order by SJL_WT desc;

select "JRJHL_G","BYJHL_YT","JRZZ_J","JRX","JRZYS_G","JRZYSJKBS_G","JRZYSWJS_G", "JRZYS_API_S_G","GXZYSJKBS_G","GXZYWJS_G","GXZY_API_S_G","JHGXZSJL_WT","JHGXZCCL_GB", "JHGXZYS_G","ZTKZS_WT","ZTKZCCL_GB","ZTKZYS_G","BMKZSJL_WT","BMKZCCL_GB","BMKZYS_G","ZQXL_WT","LXSJ_WT","SJ_T","SSSJ_WT" from "GP_SZZF_R"."JHGX" order by TBSJ DESC
select "JHSJL_WT","WTSL_WT" from "GP_SZZF_R"."SJZL" order by TBSJ DESC ;
select "BM","ZQJHSL","WTJHSL","WJHSL" from "GP_SZZF_R"."XLPM_LX" order by ZQJHSL desc
select "BM","ZQJHSL","WTJHSL","WJHSL" from "GP_SZZF_R"."XLPM_SS" order by ZQJHSL desc
select "BM","ZQJHSL","WTJHSL","WJHSL" from "GP_SZZF_R"."XLPM_QB" order by ZQJHSL desc
